=mp3 wrap=

merge

{{{class="brush: bash; ; toolbar: false;"
    $ mp3wrap tmp.mp3 *
}}}

fix file duration

{{{class="brush: bash; ; toolbar: false;"
    $ ffmpeg -i tmp_MP3WRAP.mp3 -acodec copy all.mp3 && rm tmp_MP3WRAP.mp3
}}}

copy mp3 tags

{{{class="brush: bash; ; toolbar: false;"
    $ id3cp 1.mp3 all.mp3
}}}
